comment.author: 41675580@N08
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Nautical pictures of interest., and we'd love to have this added to the group! Now this IS a spooky looking fellow if I ever saw one. He's obviously miffed at his comedown in the world and ending up here in the breakers yard!
